Review Name: Utterly Disappointed Review Description: Ac Indoor unit is very good. Bought buy seeing the reviews and got fooled. More noise and faster cooling and it has only two way swing.. Flipkart is promoting this product as 4way swing which is absolutely wrong. Ac outdoor unit is very worst part make too much loud noise.. Compressor noise is very horrible like a small generator sound Not suitable for scalm n silent areas.. Technician are very poor they are not able to figure out why these much noise from outdoor unit, no one is able to fix this issue.. Very bad experience from a reputed brand LG.
